resources.string: Shows location over a floor plan which is loaded as map overlay. Shows both IndoorAtlas location and platform location (GPS).
API credentials needed, please see gradle.properties in project root level.
Access to coarse location is required for faster first fix.
No access to locations. Time to first fix may be severely delayed!

Tutorial: 
1. Click the button to start navigation. 
 - tap on a class to get a path 
 - tap on magnifying glass to search for class/office 
2. Click the hamburger menu for options. 
 - Classrooms: shows all classrooms 
 - Offices: shows all offices 
 - Full Map: shows a full Google Map with all main buildings 
 - Settings: contact us page/other 
 - Navigation: navigation page 
 
--- Other Important Information --- 
 - blue dot is your gps location (Accurate Outside) 
 - dark blue circle is your wifi location (Accurate Inside/Under Buildings)
